title: Illaoi Skin
body: So personally I feel that the champion illaoi has been out for quite some time now and is a really strong top laner offering good tank and fight capabilities and as such I feel it is time for her to get a new skin, because currently there is only two which is her default skin and void bringer, as such a strong champion and for how long she has been out for, these are my thoughts, please feel free to express your thoughts on the topic.

replies.body: Considering how high the quality of skins has been it would be amazing to see some of the more obscure champions get the treatment. Even now I can imagine Illaoi and her tentacles imbued with the power of an element (fire, ice, electricity, light etc). Here's hoping that whatever they end up with gives us something satisfying to clonk our enemies with.
electricity would be mint, and seeing though there aren't that many electric theme skins out there they could make like a bundle and release a few, hint hint riot
Pool party illaoi was leaked a while ago... I like Illaoi's idea but I'm just not bothered to learn her{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

She's not very popular, And for good reason, mind you. She's useless if the enemy has enough sense to just walk away from her.

I know the feeling, though. I play Taliyah. She's not popular enough for a skin for her to be in high demand, and I'd like to see another skin from her. :(
Well i'm in bronze and it seems people don't understand her so i play her a lot in the hope to climb out, but  still you make a fair point, the love needs to be spread evenly
